statements: SELECT id, name, description, risk_score FROM Investment_Risk_Models;
SELECT name, risk_score FROM Investment_Risk_Models WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Risk_Models ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, risk_score FROM Investment_Risk_Models WHERE risk_score < 0.3 ORDER BY risk_score ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT description FROM Investment_Risk_Models;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Risk_Models WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Investment_Risk_Models WHERE risk_score < 0.3;
SELECT id, name, risk_score FROM Investment_Risk_Models WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY risk_score ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_models FROM Investment_Risk_Models WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;
SELECT AVG(risk_score) AS avg_risk_score, MIN(risk_score) AS min_risk_score, MAX(risk_score) AS max_risk_score FROM Investment_Risk_Models;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Risk_Model;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM Investment_Risk_Model WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Optimization ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, risk_score FROM Portfolio_Optimization WHERE risk_score > 3.5;
SELECT id, portfolio_name, portfolio_value, risk_score FROM Portfolio_Optimization WHERE portfolio_value < 5000;
SELECT id, model_name, model_description FROM Investment_Risk_Model WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Optimization WHERE risk_score > 3.5 ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value AS value_in_millions FROM Portfolio_Optimization WHERE portfolio_value > 1000000;
SELECT id, model_name, model_description FROM Investment_Risk_Model WHERE model_name LIKE '%Conservative%';
SELECT id, portfolio_name, portfolio_value, risk_score FROM Portfolio_Optimization WHERE portfolio_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskModel;
SELECT model_name, creator_name, create_date FROM RiskModel;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio WHERE risk_tolerance > 100.00;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Portfolio ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioRisk WHERE risk_value < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM RiskModel WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_name, description FROM RiskModel WHERE create_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Portfolio WHERE risk_tolerance > 500.00 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT p.portfolio_name, pr.risk_value, rm.model_name FROM Portfolio p JOIN PortfolioRisk pr ON p.id = pr.portfolio_id JOIN RiskModel rm ON pr.risk_model_id = rm.id;
SELECT DISTINCT creator_name FROM RiskModel WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, value FROM RiskMetrics WHERE value > 0.5;
SELECT ticker, price FROM StockPrices WHERE date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT metric_name, value FROM RiskMetrics WHERE model_name = 'ExampleModel';
SELECT asset_id, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM PortfolioAssets GROUP BY asset_id ORDER BY total_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskMetrics WHERE model_name = 'Model A';
SELECT metric_name, value FROM RiskMetrics WHERE value > 0.5 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE ticker = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM PortfolioAssets GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING SUM(weight) > 0.8;

SELECT PortfolioRisk.portfolio_id, PortfolioRisk.risk_score, PortfolioAssets.weight FROM PortfolioRisk JOIN PortfolioAssets ON PortfolioRisk.portfolio_id = PortfolioAssets.portfolio_id WHERE PortfolioRisk.risk_score > 0.7 AND PortfolioAssets.weight > 0.2 ORDER BY PortfolioRisk.risk_score DESC, PortfolioAssets.weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM Risk_Models;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM Risk_Models;
SELECT investment_name, investment_type, investment_amount FROM Investments WHERE investment_amount > 1000;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name FROM Portfolios ORDER BY portfolio_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, risk_score FROM Risk_Assessment WHERE risk_score < 3.5;
SELECT * FROM Risk_Models WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM Investments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM Risk_Models WHERE model_name LIKE 'Risk%';
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_description FROM Portfolios WHERE LENGTH(portfolio_name) > 10;

SELECT ra.assessment_id, rm.model_name, i.investment_name, ra.risk_score FROM Risk_Assessment ra JOIN Risk_Models rm ON ra.model_id = rm.model_id JOIN Investments i ON ra.investment_id = i.investment_id;
